NAME Tiranige (Boui, JH): báy (house, tree, village), bíní (animal, person, rock)

NAME Tebul Ure (JH): wɔ̌: (wɔ̌-yà-, perf neg wà:-lí-, imprt wá:)

NAME Mombo (Songho, KP): súgúlí, súgúlí kìjìkìjì (back part of ear)

English: earth (as brick mix or to repair walls)
français: banco, terre (pour faire des briques ou pour crépir les murs)

NAME Tebul Ure (JH): yǎy (yǎy-yà- ~ yé-yà-, perf neg ò-lí-, impf ó-m̀-dɔ̀-, impf neg ó-ŋgò, imprt yà-dá)

NAME Bunoge (Boudou): pɔ̀:lɔ̀ (modifying), ném bò ('be good', predicative only)

English: grind up, crush well (e.g. millet grains, for millet cakes) with grindstones
français: bien écraser (mil, etc.) avec deux pierres à écraser
(surface, objet) dur, raide, rigide, résistant, solide

NAME Sangha So (Moran, Sangha): dìgɛ́ \\ jáŋá (old people use; from Tommo So < Balam)

NAME Ampari (Nando, KP): kɔ̀jì-dùmbè (gé, for herb), tìŋgɔ́-dùrù (gé, for tree)

English: tie, tie up (sth or sb, with a rope)
